typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Country as string,
		Year as integer,
		Product_Type as string,
		Sales as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourcedataset
sourcedataset sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['sales.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Country,
		Year,
		Product_Type,
		Sales
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sinkdataset
